- Dependency 1 (e.g., Node.js >= 18, Python >= 3.10, etc.)
- Dependency 2
- ...

### Installation & Run

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone <your-repo-url>
cd <your-project-dir>

# Install dependencies
<your-install-command>

# Start the project
<your-start-command>
```

```bash

```
